name: Ultimate Fish Fight
description:
A game made for the LD48 jam.

Life is hard as a fisherman, and to make things worse, competition with other fishers has increased dramatically. Defend your livelihood.

Catch a fish on your hook then bring it to the surface using the following keys:
W - Move hook up
S - Move hook down

Collect fish, then attack your enemy and block other fishers’ throws using the following keys:
E - Basic attack, uses 1 fish and does minimal damage
R - Medium attack, uses 5 fish and does decent damage
T - Advanced attack, uses 10 fish and does substantial damage
